name: Melon Bike
description:
This is a short original game by Jordan Grayson using a given set of constraints created by Bennett Foddy. The watermelon sprites, color palette, and winning sound effect were given as part of the constraints. The last constraint was a function that normalizes random number generation which was used for all randomness in this game.

Author

The game design, art, programming, and sound effects for Melon Bike were made by Jordan Grayson. The music was inspired by Robby Duguay and recreated by Jordan Grayson. This game was created during a one week period in Pico-8.
